title: Media player classic
description:
Its small size, low memory footprint, and numerous features make this the media player of choice, but you must add the proper codecs to perfect this freeware and to play your favorite video formats.

K-Lite Mega Codec Pack.
 <a href=" http://www.download3k.com/MP3-Audio-Video/Video-Utilities-Codecs/Download-K-Lite-Mega-Codec-Pack.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.download3k.com/MP3-Audio-Video/Video-Utilities-Codecs/Download-K-Lite-Mega-Codec-Pack.html</a>

Media Player Classic&#039;s interface reflects its title--retro, old school, basic. This single player easily replaces the four or five video players installed on most systems. Media Player Classic also easily loads and plays DVDs. and plays most audio formats.

If you watch video or listen to audio, this freeware player is a must-have program.
